statements: SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT satellite_name, location FROM satellites;
SELECT * FROM satellites WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT satellite_name, last_contact FROM satellites;
SELECT location, satellite_name, last_contact FROM satellites;
SELECT satellite_name, location FROM satellites WHERE last_contact > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM satellites WHERE last_contact < '2020-12-31' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_satellites FROM satellites;
SELECT * FROM satellites WHERE satellite_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY last_contact ASC;
SELECT satellite_name, location FROM satellites WHERE location LIKE '%earth%' AND last_contact BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT satellite_name, current_location FROM satellites;
SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name, current_location, last_updated FROM satellites ORDER BY satellite_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT * FROM satellites WHERE current_location LIKE '%space%';
SELECT * FROM satellites WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT satellite_name, current_location FROM satellites WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name, current_location FROM satellites ORDER BY satellite_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT * FROM satellites s JOIN locations l ON s.current_location = l.location_name;
SELECT id, name, launch_date, current_location FROM satellites;
SELECT name, current_location FROM satellites WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT name, launch_date FROM satellites WHERE current_location = 'Space';
SELECT satellite_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_locations JOIN locations ON satellite_locations.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT id, name, launch_date, current_location FROM satellites WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM satellites ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT name, current_location FROM satellites WHERE launch_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT s.name, l.location_name FROM satellites s INNER JOIN satellite_locations sl ON s.id = sl.satellite_id INNER JOIN locations l ON sl.location_id = l.location_id;

SELECT DISTINCT s.name, l.location_name, l.latitude, l.longitude FROM satellites s INNER JOIN satellite_locations sl ON s.id = sl.satellite_id INNER JOIN locations l ON sl.location_id = l.location_id WHERE l.latitude BETWEEN -90.000 and 90.000;
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT satellite_name, current_location FROM satellites;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE elevation > 1000;
SELECT satellite_id, location_id FROM satellite_locations WHERE time_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT query_id, query_text, result_count FROM queries ORDER BY query_time DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name FROM satellites;
SELECT current_location, last_updated FROM satellites ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE elevation > 1000;

SELECT satellite_name, latitude, longitude, location_name FROM satellites INNER JOIN satellite_locations ON satellites.satellite_id = satellite_locations.satellite_id INNER JOIN locations ON satellite_locations.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT query_id, query_text, result_count FROM queries WHERE query_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM satellites
SELECT satellite_name, current_location FROM satellites
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations
SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name, current_location FROM satellites ORDER BY satellite_id DESC
SELECT query_name, location_id FROM queries WHERE query_id = 1
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT satellite_name, current_location FROM satellites WHERE last_known_location='Earth';
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude > 50;
SELECT satellite_id, location_id, timestamp FROM satellite_locations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT results.result_id, results.query_id, satellites.satellite_name, locations.location_name FROM results JOIN satellites ON results.satellite_id = satellites.satellite_id JOIN locations ON results.location_id = locations.location_id;
